COMMAND.name: show bfd peer
show bfd peer counters
show bfd peers

PARAM.name: brief
PARAM.help: Show BFD peer information in tabular form

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

COMMAND.name: peer
no peer
no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

COMMAND.name: detect-multiplier
echo-interval

PARAM.name: echo_interval
PARAM.help: Configure peer echo interval value in milliseconds

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${multi-hop}" != ""; then
if test "${address}" != "peer_ipv6"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_multi_hop_desired_minimum_echo_receive
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_multi_hop_desired_minimum_echo_receive
fi
else
if test "${address}" != "peer_ipv6"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_single_hop_desired_minimum_echo_receive ${peer-ipv4addr} ${interface-name} ${vrf-name} ${local-ipv4addr} ${echo_interval}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_single_hop_desired_minimum_echo_receive ${peer-ipv6addr} ${interface-name} ${vrf-name} ${local-ipv6addr} ${echo_interval}
fi
fi

COMMAND.name: echo-mode
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${multi-hop}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_multi_hop_echo_active
else
if test "${address}" != "peer_ipv6"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_single_hop_echo_active ${peer-ipv4addr} ${interface-name} ${vrf-name} ${local-ipv4addr}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_single_hop_echo_active ${peer-ipv6addr} ${interface-name} ${vrf-name} ${local-ipv6addr}
fi
fi

COMMAND.name: no echo-mode
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${multi-hop}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_multi_hop_echo_active
else
if test "${address}" != "peer_ipv6"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_single_hop_echo_active_disable ${peer-ipv4addr} ${interface-name} ${vrf-name} ${local-ipv4addr}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bfd.py patch_openconfig_bfd_ext_bfd_sessions_single_hop_echo_active_disable ${peer-ipv6addr} ${interface-name} ${vrf-name} ${local-ipv6addr}
fi
fi

COMMAND.name: receive-interval

PARAM.name: receive_interval
PARAM.help: Configure peer receive interval value in milliseconds

COMMAND.name: shutdown
no shutdown
transmit-interval

PARAM.name: transmit_interval
PARAM.help: Configure peer transmit interval value in milliseconds
